br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller
Class ControllerManager

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.ControllerManager

public class ControllerManager
extends Object

The Cotopaxi Controller. This is application/requests entry point. Its responsible by all the application workflow. At startup, the controller loads the ModelFacade and configures the controller, and on each request, it maps the request, prepares the parameters, executes the the model method, the filters, and process the response.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Constructor Summary

          Creates and setup the controller.
 
Method Summary
 ActionResponse process(RequestWrapper request, MetadataHandler metadata)
          Checks the permissions for the given RequestWrapper/MetadataHandler, check format, execute the ModelController and return the SuccessActionResponse.

Constructor Detail

ControllerManager

public ControllerManager(CotopaxiConfigView config)
Creates and setup the controller. Creates the configurator, configure it, starts the Mapper and the executor, loads all the meta-information about model methods.

                       throws AuthorizationException,
                              FilterException,

Checks the permissions for the given RequestWrapper/MetadataHandler, check format, execute the ModelController and return the SuccessActionResponse.
